priorVersion.title: CDISC Protocol Ingredient Type Value Set Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C177907

self.title: CDISC Protocol Ingredient Type Value Set Terminology

definition: The terminology relevant to the identification of the kind of ingredient.
name: Ingredient Type Value Set Terminology
preferredTerm: CDISC Protocol Ingredient Type Value Set Terminology

terms.definition: Any component of a drug product intended to exert pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease, or to affect the structure or any function of the body of humans or other animals. (After 21 CFR 210.3(b)(7))
Any component of a study product other than an active ingredient. (After FDA 21 CFR 210.3(b)(8))
